extendedInfo.description: âââ Concept âââThis is a paper cut sea landscape live wallpaper with a lot of object in paper craft art that come with interactive feature. Paper sea live wallpaper also support theme and customization. âââ Aquarium âââThis beautiful live wallpaper work as a big ocean aquarium. There are a lot of cute paper craft fish swimming around. You can choose the number of fish, color, size and other behavior in setting. There are also some sea coral, animated seaweed, and unique sea plants as ocean background.âââ Theme âââThere are 3 built in theme you can choose from setting. Normal, Rainy, Snowy (with snow fall effect), and Grayscale. All these theme work on any time mode you choose. Notice that some customization setting will be disabled on some theme.âââ Time âââYou can choose a fixed time mode, based on real time or even accelerated time mode. The sun and moon will move according to time. In day, you will have some cloud moving across the screen. While in night, the interactive stars will appears on sky.âââ Interactivity âââHere is the interesting part, most of these paper art is interactive. You can:~ Feeding fish by tapping anywhere in the water. You can even set the fish to change its color according to the food color its eat. ~ Moving fish by simply drag and drop them.~ Moving cloud~ Moving tree~ Moving star to form your favorite star formation~ Tapping on star to make it spin~ Tapping on cloud to change its colorâââ Message notification feature âââNew feature! Floating message bottle will appear when there is a unread message in your inbox. Tap on it will bring you to message app. That's why we need READ_SMS_PERMISSION.âââ Other Features âââ~ Original art work~ A lot of customization setting~ Portrait and Landscape orientation support~ Tablet support~ Small memory usage~ Small battery usage~ MoveToSD support~ Smooth animationTo open and setting up your live wallpaper: Home-> Press menu-> wallpapers-> Live Wallpapers.

reviews.title: Beautiful and Unique!!
reviews.comment: Very soothing to watch!! :) Love to move the stars and fish around. It is also neat that you can change the cloud\'s color by touching them. Love the reflection of real-life day and night, watching the clouds go by or seeing the shining colorful stars at night. So cute how you can feed the fish too! Highly recommend paid version!! :)
reviews.author: Carmen Campbell

reviews.title: Love This!
reviews.comment: This wallpaper is so great for summer! It looks much better in real life. I love how the sky changes according to the time of day. Very fun and colorful!
reviews.author: Michelle Ramos
